intro: Psychotria belamboi, commonly known as the Amazonian psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves and produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in shaded, humid environments within dense forest understories. Psychotria belamboi is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses among indigenous communities.
